history.proof: intros. unfold prod_ball. unfold ball. destruct x as [x1 x2]. split. - sauto lq: on depth: 3use: UniformSpace. - sauto lq: on depth: 3use: UniformSpace.

exceptions.exn: In environment U, V : UniformSpace x1 : U x2 : V eps : posreal The term "x1" has type "UniformSpace.sort U" while it is expected to have type "UniformSpace.mixin_of U".
Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.
In environment U, V : UniformSpace x1 : U x2 : V eps : posreal The term "x2" has type "UniformSpace.sort V" while it is expected to have type "UniformSpace.mixin_of V".

original: intros V U x eps. unfold prod_ball. unfold ball. destruct x as [x1 x2]. split. - apply (UniformSpace.ax1 U x1 eps). - apply (UniformSpace.ax1 V x2 eps).
